name: Jitsu
description: The easiest real-time data collection in the world. Please, read the guide before deploying: https://jitsu.com/docs/deployment/deploy-on-heroku

CONFIGURATOR_ADMIN_TOKEN.description: A secret Jitsu Configurator Admin token for Jitsu Server -> Jitsu Configurator integration. You can find this value in Heroku App settings after start.

SERVER_ADMIN_TOKEN.description: A secret Jitsu Server Admin token for Jitsu Configurator -> Jitsu Server integration. You can find this value in Heroku App settings after start.

UI_AUTH_ACCESS_SECRET.description: JWT access secret for UI authorization flow (generating authorization JWT objects). You can find this value in Heroku App settings after start.

UI_AUTH_REFRESH_SECRET.description: JWT refresh secret for UI authorization flow (generating refreshing JTW objects). You can find this value in Heroku App settings after start.

GEO_MAXMIND_PATH.description: GEO data resolution (https://jitsu.com/docs/other-features/geo-data-resolution). HTTP URL to hosted maxmind DB file.
